Posts.Content: Hi GMA!  Thanks so much for your reply!  I am in the throws of early menopause, so maybe that is it!  I feel better already, tho i know I still have to go thru the next mammogram.
Posts.Title: Second Call back On Mammogram and scared

Posts.Content: Hi Everyone... I just got a call to come back for more pictures from my routine yearly mammogram.Of course it worries me.. they said they just want some more pictures because there was a change from last year.. That  they usually have 1 -3 call backs every day, but it is scary when it is you.
Posts.Title: Second Call back On Mammogram and scared

Posts.Content:
Hello! I was called back after a routine mammogram. They wanted a second look at a change in my left breast. They scare you to death, being very clinical about
 it. I asked the Tech what we were looking AT,, when she took yet a 3rd view. She said the radiologist thinks it is a mole ( which i dont have ) or in the skin.. .. huh?
Posts.Title: My results were good!

Posts.Content:
Thank you so much MK..!! you actually made me relax a little when you told me about
 hormonal changes.. and that is what it was! I just wish more people knew about
 this site.. Im working on that ! I for sure have all my yearly tests and physicals.. Hugs back at ya!
Posts.Title: My results were good!
